enWisdom: Reliance on [divine] decree is more comforting

Wisdom: الرِّضَا بِقَضَاءِ اللَّهِ يُهَوِّنُ عَظِيمَ الرَّزَايَا
enWisdom: Satisfaction with the decree of Allah makes great calamities easy [to bear]

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ رَضِيتُمْ بِالْقَضَاءِ طَابَتْ عِيشَتُكُمْ‏ وَ فُزْتُمْ بِالْغَنَاءِ
enWisdom: Indeed if you are pleased with the decree [of Allah], your lives will become enjoyable and you will attain prosperity

Wisdom: بِالرِّضَا بِقَضَاءِ اللَّهِ يُسْتَدَلُّ عَلَى حُسْنِ الْيَقِينِ
enWisdom: By satisfaction with the decree of Allah, the strength of [one’s] certitude is evinced

Wisdom: عَلَامَةُ رِضَا اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ عَنِ الْعَبْدِ رِضَاهُ بِمَا قَضَى بِهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَهُ وَعَلَيْهِ
enWisdom: The sign that Allah, the Glorified, is pleased with His servant is his [the servant’s] satisfaction with that which He, the Glorified, has decreed for or against him
One who is pleased with the decree [of Allah] is at ease
Whoever is pleased with [Allah’s] decree, his life becomes pleasant
Whoever is pleased with [Allah’s] decree, his life becomes pleasant

Wisdom: مَنْ حَسُنَ رِضَاهُ بِالْقَضَاءِ حَسُنَ صَبْرُهُ عَلَى الْبَلَاءِ
enWisdom: One whose satisfaction with what is decreed is good, his patience in [times of] tribulation will be good
What a good expeller of sadness satisfaction with [divine] decree is!
He who is satisfied with the decree [of Allah] has acquired abundance

Wisdom: نَالَ الْغِنَى مَنْ رُزِقَ الْيَأْسَ عَمَّا فِي أَيْدِي النَّاسِ وَالْقَنَاعَةَ بِمَا أُوتِيَ وَالرِّضَا بِالْقَضَاءِ
enWisdom: He who has been granted hopelessness in [obtaining] what people possess, contentment with what he is given and satisfaction with the divine decree has acquired affluence
Seek the pleasure of Allah by being satisfied with His decree
One who is satisfied with the decree [of Allah] takes the changing circumstances [of his life] lightly
Whoever is satisfied with what has been decreed, his certitude is strengthened

Wisdom: مَنْ وَثِقَ بِأَنَّ مَا قَدَّرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ لَنْ يَفُوتَهُ اسْتَرَاحَ قَلْبُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is certain that what Allah has decreed for him will never escape him, his heart becomes relaxed

Wisdom: نِعْمَ الطَّارِدُ لِلْهَمِّ الِاتِّكَالُ عَلَى الْقَدَرِ
enWisdom: What a good expeller of sadness satisfaction with [divine] decree is!
Be satisfied and you will be relaxed
The fruit of satisfaction is prosperity
Every satisfied one is at ease
